translation: These qualities, O Arjuna, born of Nature, bind fast in the body of the embodied, the indestructible: purity, passion, and inertia.
commentary: 14.5 Sattvam purity? Rajah passion? Darkness inertia? Is it these? qualities alities? Prakritisambhavah born of Prakriti? bind bind? Mighty-armed O mightyarmed? Dehe in the body? Dehinam the embodied? Avyayam the,indestructible.Commentary Sattva is the best. Rajas comes next. Tamas is the lowest and the worst. The three alities indicate the triple mentality. Do they produce attachment in the individual souls? delude
